item.title: Dog of the Year ahow 2007
item.description: Nala at the Dog of the Year show, where she ended 5th best terrier of the Netherlands.

item.title: ASTCH Dutch Specialty 2007
item.description: At the ASTCH Ducth Specialty with 134 entries Nala finished BOB and Best in Show.

item.title: Nala Smiles
